description:
Lina decides to visit a magic doctor who resides deep in the mountains in order to regain her magical power.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: De drôles de compagnons (Revenez, pouvoirs magiques)
Kusemonozoroi no Chindouchuu?! Maryoku o Torimodose!
La drum cu ticăloşii / Recuperarea puterii magice
On a Journey with a Pack of Scoundrels?! Take Back That Magic Power!
Путешествие с пройдохами?! Верните мне мою магию!
クセ者ぞろいの珍道中?! 魔力を取り戻せ!
